query: Is it safe to drink water here?

retrieval.query: Is it safe to drink water here?

bfs_candidates.title: Safe food and water after a disaster
bfs_candidates.text: Avoid open-sourced water. Store water in clean containers. If unsure, disinfect and boil before use.

bfs_candidates.title: Boil water advisory
bfs_candidates.text: If water contamination is suspected, boil water for 1 minute before drinking. Use bottled water if available.

bfs_candidates.title: Municipal tap water guidance
bfs_candidates.text: After flooding, municipal water supply may be compromised. Check local municipal advisories before using tap water.

bfs_candidates.title: Vector-borne disease prevention
bfs_candidates.text: After floods, watch for mosquito-borne diseases. Use bed nets, remove standing water and seek medical help for fever symptoms.

bfs_candidates.title: Claims process for crop insurance
bfs_candidates.text: To claim crop insurance, submit field loss estimates and contact the insurance agent within the stipulated period.

a_star_candidates.title: Safe food and water after a disaster
a_star_candidates.text: Avoid open-sourced water. Store water in clean containers. If unsure, disinfect and boil before use.

a_star_candidates.title: Boil water advisory
a_star_candidates.text: If water contamination is suspected, boil water for 1 minute before drinking. Use bottled water if available.

a_star_candidates.title: Municipal tap water guidance
a_star_candidates.text: After flooding, municipal water supply may be compromised. Check local municipal advisories before using tap water.

a_star_candidates.title: Vector-borne disease prevention
a_star_candidates.text: After floods, watch for mosquito-borne diseases. Use bed nets, remove standing water and seek medical help for fever symptoms.

a_star_candidates.title: Pesticide safety and reporting
a_star_candidates.text: Report severe crop damage to the local Agriculture Helpline. Use protective gear while applying pesticides.

final_snippet.title: Safe food and water after a disaster
final_snippet.text: Avoid open-sourced water. Store water in clean containers. If unsure, disinfect and boil before use.

query: When will compensation come after the flood?

retrieval.query: When will compensation come after the flood?

bfs_candidates.title: Flood relief compensation
bfs_candidates.text: Affected households can apply for flood relief compensation via the District Relief Portal. Required documents: ID, photos of damage.

query: What to do for crop pest attack?

retrieval.query: What to do for crop pest attack?

bfs_candidates.title: Crop pest management (locusts)
bfs_candidates.text: For locust infestations, notify your agriculture officer. Follow approved pesticide application rates and safety procedures.

bfs_candidates.title: Claims process for crop insurance
bfs_candidates.text: To claim crop insurance, submit field loss estimates and contact the insurance agent within the stipulated period.

bfs_candidates.title: Pesticide safety and reporting
bfs_candidates.text: Report severe crop damage to the local Agriculture Helpline. Use protective gear while applying pesticides.

bfs_candidates.title: Flood relief compensation
bfs_candidates.text: Affected households can apply for flood relief compensation via the District Relief Portal. Required documents: ID, photos of damage.

bfs_candidates.title: How compensation is disbursed
bfs_candidates.text: Compensation is disbursed after damage verification by a field officer; processing times vary across districts.
